content.raw:
It passes on my desktop, but its failed on every Jenkins build that has run thus far (default-precise, default-quantal, and default-precise-ati). The others haven't finished yet.

[gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64 build 271](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64/271/testReport/(root)/TransportStressTest/ManyNodes/)
~~~
test/regression/transport_stress.cc:205
Expected: (static_cast<unsigned int>(pubDiff.nsec)) <
         ((g_localPublishMessageCount * nodes.size()) * 1500),
actual: 664450038 vs 30000000
test/regression/transport_stress.cc:208: Failure
Expected: (receiveDiff.sec) < (g_localPublishCount * 1e-6), actual: 48 vs 40
Time to publish 20000 = 41 664450038
Time to receive 40000000 = 48 86507559
~~~

--------

[gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-ati build 126](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-ati/126/testReport/(root)/Results/test_ran/)
~~~
test/regression/transport_stress.cc:196: Failure
Expected: (waitCount) < (50), actual: 50 vs 50
test/regression/transport_stress.cc:199: Failure
Value of: g_localPublishCount
  Actual: 10861615
Expected: g_totalExpectedMsgCount
Which is: 40000000
Time to publish 20000 = 0 20160534
Time to receive 10862986 = -10 -880418577
transport_stress: /usr/include/boost/thread/pthread/pthread_mutex_scoped_lock.hpp:26: boost::pthread::pthread_mutex_scoped_lock::pthread_mutex_scoped_lock(pthread_mutex_t*): 
Assertion `!pthread_mutex_lock(m)' failed.
transport_stress: /usr/include/boost/thread/pthread/pthread_mutex_scoped_lock.hpp:26: boost::pthread::pthread_mutex_scoped_lock::pthread_mutex_scoped_lock(pthread_mutex_t*): 
Assertion `!pthread_mutex_lock(m)' failed.
transport_stress .................***Exception: Other201.41 sec
~~~

--------

[gazebo-default-devel-quantal-amd64 build 105](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-default-devel-quantal-amd64/105/testReport/(root)/Results/test_ran/)
~~~
test/regression/transport_stress.cc:196: Failure
Expected: (waitCount) < (50), actual: 50 vs 50
test/regression/transport_stress.cc:199: Failure
Value of: g_localPublishCount
  Actual: 1472
Expected: g_totalExpectedMsgCount
Which is: 40000000
test/regression/transport_stress.cc:205: Failure
Expected: (static_cast<unsigned int>(pubDiff.nsec)) <
          ((g_localPublishMessageCount * nodes.size()) * 1500),
actual: 978587673 vs 30000000
Time to publish 20000 = 0 978587673
Time to receive 1472 = -13 -258089831
transport_stress .................***Timeout 241.05 sec
~~~
content.html:
It passes on my desktop, but its failed on every Jenkins build that has run thus far (default-precise, default-quantal, and default-precise-ati). The others haven't finished yet.

gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64 build 271

test/regression/transport_stress.cc:205
Expected: (static_cast<unsigned int>(pubDiff.nsec)) <
         ((g_localPublishMessageCount * nodes.size()) * 1500),
actual: 664450038 vs 30000000
test/regression/transport_stress.cc:208: Failure
Expected: (receiveDiff.sec) < (g_localPublishCount * 1e-6), actual: 48 vs 40
Time to publish 20000 = 41 664450038
Time to receive 40000000 = 48 86507559

gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-ati build 126

test/regression/transport_stress.cc:196: Failure
Expected: (waitCount) < (50), actual: 50 vs 50
test/regression/transport_stress.cc:199: Failure
Value of: g_localPublishCount
  Actual: 10861615
Expected: g_totalExpectedMsgCount
Which is: 40000000
Time to publish 20000 = 0 20160534
Time to receive 10862986 = -10 -880418577
transport_stress: /usr/include/boost/thread/pthread/pthread_mutex_scoped_lock.hpp:26: boost::pthread::pthread_mutex_scoped_lock::pthread_mutex_scoped_lock(pthread_mutex_t*): 
Assertion `!pthread_mutex_lock(m)' failed.
transport_stress: /usr/include/boost/thread/pthread/pthread_mutex_scoped_lock.hpp:26: boost::pthread::pthread_mutex_scoped_lock::pthread_mutex_scoped_lock(pthread_mutex_t*): 
Assertion `!pthread_mutex_lock(m)' failed.
